Ingredients.3: 1 (24 ounce) jar pasta sauce (such as Ragu®)

Ingredients.5: 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened and cubed

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).

Directions.2: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add ziti and cook, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 11 minutes. Drain.

Directions.3: Combine 4 cups mozzarella, pasta sauce, ricotta, cream cheese, 2 tablespoons Parmesan, Italian seasoning, garlic powder, and salt in a large mixing bowl. Add cooked ziti and mix well to coat. Transfer to a 9x13-inch glass baking dish. Sprinkle remaining mozzarella and Parmesan over top, along with parsley. Cover with foil.

Directions.4: Bake in the preheated oven until thoroughly heated and cheese on top is melted, 20 to 30 minutes.
